data.name: the City of plague
data.detailed_description:
This is an open world Zombie Survival game. The location is set in a modern city with a large population, A large number of citizens became monsters due to infection. You will play as a student who is forced to stay in the city because missed the last evacuation.
You need to explore the city, find supplies, and arm yourself. Every car, box, trash can, ATM and room in the city may contain what you need, or a large group of hungry zombies.


You need to stay in school with other survivors left in the city, defend your camp and survive.



Using all kinds of materials you collected can strengthen the defense ability of the camp. Zombies like to break into your camp when your attention is slack.



You can plant food in the spare parts of the camp, or harvest eggs by raising chickens. The remaining crops can also be used to trade with survivors.



The game has a wealth of plots and scenes, prisons, hospitals, police stations, military bases, etc. you need to complete a variety of tasks to promote the plot of the game, and finally discover the secrets hidden behind the plague.

data.short_description: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7
  • Processor: i5-4460及以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Set using Discrete graphics before run.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 六核CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Set using Discrete graphics before run.
